"Marlu": "Well? Do you know how to use your rod now?"

"Stay the right distance away. And use charged
techniques as appropriate. Rods are all
about your skill and experience."

"Sorry, did I interrupt you in the middle of
something? Then you'd better get back to
work. Come see me when you're done."

"……どうかしら。
ロッドの使い方、わかってきた？"

"……適正な距離を把握し
チャージしたテクニックを的確に撃つ。
装者の技術と経験が活きる武装よ。"

"……ごめんなさい、戦闘中だったわね。
それじゃ、帰還したら
一度私に会いに来て。"
